snippet: A City Council plan to set modest fines for small amounts and no arrests won the support of Mayor Michael A. Nutter.
abstract: Philadelphia City Council plan to set modest fines for people caught with small amounts of marijuana or smoking it in public and no arrests wins support of Mayor Michael A Nutter.
lead_paragraph: A City Council plan to set modest fines for small amounts and no arrests won the support of Mayor Michael A. Nutter.

headline.main: Philadelphia Nears Deal to Ease Marijuana Laws
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Nears Deal to Ease Marijuana Laws
